name: Sandesh Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Sandesh Recipe: Milk 2 kg Caster sugar 1 cup Cardamom 1 tbsp Almonds, pistachios 1 tbsp Citric acid 1 tsp
instructions: In a pan boil milk and stove off now in a small pot Citric acid dissolve in milk When milk curdling then leave for 5 minutes . Then half kg water mix and strain on Muslim cloth then cool it . Now add in sugar powder and cardamom . Then spread on gracy tray and cool it Finally garnish with almonds and pistachio and serve .
